website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for older kids if you don't mind paying the high price, otherwise you might want to consider the others on our shortlist.
pros: Durable 20-inch wheel allows wide, quick turns
Hand brake and dual-stick steering ads to the fast stop-and-go fun
cons: Expensive, and not practical for very small children

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I have an older 98223 and was able to make a seat pan to adapt this new style seat (98305) to the older model. All that for my Autistic son who adores this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeff slaughter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My kids have had these for two years now and they are 13, 12 and 9. All still use it! Mind you, the seat is cracked and has been taped. I know I could purchase another seat, but they have been fine with the cracked one. The second one we have is fine. The only bad part was the box when we recieved it. It was LITERALLY out of the box when it showed up at my front doorstep on a late (9pm) rainy evening. I was afraid that I was missing parts but thankfully everything was there. Overall my kids LOVE this so that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger kids, but large and clunky
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old had just destroyed the front wheel of his big wheel from use. We bought the 20" model of the Green Machine because we thought it would last him a long time. The build quality is very good and definitely more robust than typical big wheels. However, the length and weight of this overall model make it difficult to perform some of the spins you see in the commercials. Perhaps the 16" would be a little easier to handle. On the 20", it is a bit clumsy, but he seems to like it enough. He does praise the traction the front rubber tire gives over previous plastic front wheel models he has had.
customer_reviews.author: MannyB

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Miss read the age level in the description which could better be represented by a height requirement. Over all the product is quite heavy and well made but there have been reports of the seat and flags breaking. Took some effort to assemble correctly. Our younger than recommended grand kids were able to roll the trike in a full spin turn so be careful. At 5 and 6 years old they still had fun but could not pedal. It is rated for 8 years to adult which is why I bought it so I I could ride it too. Sorry to say I still have not rode it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: ... year old daughter test drove it once and instantly loved it. I'd forgotten about it until I saw ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter test drove it once and instantly loved it. I'd forgotten about it until I saw it on her Christmas wish list "the green thing". She loves riding her green machine. And I also love it because it's not only fun...it's also great exercise for her.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa_maze

customer_reviews.title: 180's!
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to flip this over when doing a 180 so be careful. But its really really fun to drive! I hope I can buy replacement rear tires BC I'm sure they will wear out quickly with how much my boys ride it
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Most shared of my son's riding toys!
customer_reviews.text: This vehicle has enriched the lives of several of the kids in my neighborhood! They share it and take turns so well too. Plus I enjoy watching them play. As a matter of fact, it is rated for adults as well, up to 150 pounds. The seat adjusts to fit leg length. Assembly was not difficult, but awkward in some areas if you are short like I am. Fortunately I had help, which I highly recommend. The required assistance in no way effects the number of stars, though. Instructions were clear and concise. All in all, this is money well-spent!
customer_reviews.author: bonita herren montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for young and old, and good exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old granddaughter because it was on her Christmas wish list. It arrived and my son put it together with relative ease. Then on Christmas day she rode the Green Machine even in the cold! But the adults rode it too! It handled the weight (up to 185 pounds) with no trouble! My 6 year old granddaughter was able to ride it as well, as the seat can be adjusted with little effort. She wants one now. I really like that it is not motorized. Kids need exercise, and they will as long as they are having fun. I gave it a 5 star because it performed as advertized and better!
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Sure didn't last long. We didn't even have this ...
customer_reviews.text: Sure didn't last long. We didn't even have this a year and the back plastic wheels go a hole in them. Tried to fix them and still didn't work right. Really wish the back wheels were made of rubber. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: JJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility in seat helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my 6 year old son. Due to his height, we need to add a pillow behind him at the shortest position, but he doesn't mind. There is a ton of flexibility in the seat, as well, so we went with the larger 20" size to allow for use for many years to cone!! These have been a hit at the campgrounds, and the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: KellSims

product_meta.title: Huffy Green Machine
product_meta.description:
The legendary Green Machine spins, slides and glides its way into a new generation. 

The first 180° spin is heart-pounding. The long slides, drifts and skids are head-turning. The ride is all-around game-changing! 

The Huffy Green Machine has been part of some of the best childhood memories for decades of kids. From using dual-stick steering like a pro, to making outrageous spins at that perfect moment, your friends will be lining up for the chance to take a spin on your green ride. 

The new designs and innovations of this legendary ride deliver better spins and smoother slides along with total comfort. Take Control - Lose Control with the new age of Huffy Green Machines.
feature_bullets: This 20 inch Green Machine has a lower center of gravity for improved performance.
Infinitely-adjustable seat with improved lateral support.
Dual stick steering with dual-density soft touch green/black grips
